import React from 'react' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import classes from './MealItem.module.css' import MealsSummary from '../MealsSummary' function MealItem(props) { const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` return (

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    {/*
    */}
    • ) } export default MealItem
